entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianDescription
entry.value: Drookians gain increased accuracy while Overwatching and increased damage when attacking Forests, but lose morale when near non-Drookians unless in the prescence of a Commissar.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianFlavor
entry.value: Hardened by the harsh swamps of their homeworld, Drookians are expert ambushers and scouts. With this lifetime of wading through swamps, Drookians have also learned that any lofty ideals of "humanity's brotherhood" are barely worth the paper they're printed on. Drookians find that true loyality and brotherhood is found within your clan, making them greatly distrusting of foreigners. While individually courageous, when the cards are on the table, they would much rather flee and live for their clan. To die for some distant, uncaring God-Emperor, they need proper... motivation.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianSaboteurDescription
entry.value: Increased damage against vehicles. Greatly increased damage against Fortifications. Grenades have a reduced bonus against Fortifications, with no bonus against Vehicles.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianSaboteurFlavor
entry.value: Back on Drook VI, identifying and exploiting the smallest cracks can send even the greatest walls crashing into the bog.

entry.name: HarassedDescription
entry.value: Loses morale every turn and has decreased accuracy.

entry.name: HarassedFlavor
entry.value: Constant night attacks have left these troops exhausted, decreasing their combat readiness.

entry.name: UndersuppliedDescription
entry.value: Loses morale every turn. Costs more resources to upkeep.

entry.name: UndersuppliedFlavor
entry.value: Troops without food and weapons are of little use. Efforts must be spent to resupply them.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/SpoilsOfWarFlavor
entry.value: One man's loss is another man's gain. Tonight, the Drookian lads shall drink!

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianAssassinationDescription
entry.value: Increased attacks against enemies that have moved. Increased attacks against enemies inside Outposts. Increased damage against Heroes.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/DrookianAssassinationFlavor
entry.value: After a long march, there's nothing like a knife to the throat to put you to rest.
